page.title: 14INDUSTRIES IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {CRAFT INDUSTRY.}As well as locally produced crafts in wood and pottery many women knit jerseys and socks in Harris wool.These are sold to the Harris Craft Guild and they find a market for these goods by attending craft fairs on the mainland.Much of the knitwear is sold ton overseas countries. {HARRIS TWEED INDUSTRY Wool is spun on machines in mills in Stornoway and is then delivered to the 5 weavers in our area to be woven into cloth.The finished tweed is then sent back to the mills in Stornoway.From there it is sold all over the world.Weavers are trained in college in Stornoway and then they buy their own looms and work at home.They produce 2 or 3 tweeds in a week.
